article_node.title: Analysis: Trump is furious at China, but he’s making US foes great again
article_node.summary: Trump’s 2025‑09‑02 Truth Social post condemning China’s parade and announcing tougher tariffs is likely to weaken the US dollar against the yuan (USDCNH) in the short term, as the US signals a hard‑line stance on Chinese trade. The catalyst is the post itself, which signals a shift in US‑China policy that could push the US dollar lower versus the CNY over the next few weeks, following the causal path of tariff escalation to currency pressure.
